# type

**Instance Property**

The kind of detected feature the search result represents.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: ARHitTestResult.ResultType { get }
```

## Discussion

You specify one or more result types to search for when calling a hit-testing method. A result object has only one result type.

## Identifying Results

- **ARHitTestResult.ResultType**: Possible types for specifying a hit-test search, or for the result of a hit-test search.
- **anchor**: The anchor representing the detected surface, if any.
